About the band:
Seasoned London rapper Olos clicked into a different league when he advertised for a Hip-Rock band and found drummer Josh Carpenter, bassist Ewan McIntosh and lead guitarists Alex Scheuerer & Ruslan Zhurbin.

 The band's first ever gig was at the 100 Club and since then they have amazed crowds at Proud Camden, Dublin Castle, The Enterprise, Motherlive, Nambucca, Underbelly & AAA, and are showcasing throughout the summer while they complete their debut album recording.
